subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Doping
Steroids
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Only Nick Symmonds advanced out of the first round Wednesday night, with Andrew Wheating the victim of a strong heat and Christian Smith not adjusting well to his first major international meet.
snippet: Only Nick Symmonds advanced out of the first round Wednesday night, with Andrew Wheating the victim of a strong heat and Christian Smith not adjusting well to his first major international meet.
